attributes.action: Under no circumstances should the UK give vaccine supply away to a third party.
attributes.additional_details: As one of the countries hardest hit by a Covid 19 virus and having procured a number of different vaccines produced and paid for by the UK taxpayer .  We must ensure that of the British population are fully protected before we start sharing our supplies with other countries. it is abhorrent to consider that other countries who are less prepared than us and less impacted  should receive this before the uk.  Once we are protected we can then help the less fortunate countries buy not the EU.
attributes.background: As one of the countries hardest hit by the Covid 19 virus and having procured a number of different vaccines produced and paid for by the UK population and their taxes.  We must ensure that all members of the British population are fully vaccinated before we share our supplies with other countries.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Stop pharmaceutical companies exporting UK made vaccines until UK contracts met
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572610
